HigherOrderDerivatives Automatic higher order differentiation of generic Julia Functions. This repository contains an original implementation of (forward) automatic differentiation via dual numbers. Higher order derivatives are obtained by recursively chaining duals numbers together. Example: julia > using HigherOrderDerivatives julia > f (x :: Real ) = exp (x ^ 3 * cos ( - x) ^ 2 * sin (x)); julia > D = x -> derivative (f, x); # gives first derivative julia > D⁹ = x -> derivative (f, x, 9 ); # gives 9th derivative julia > D ( 0.8 ) 0.567190549030136 julia > D⁹( 0.8 ) - 2.982695656166806e6 julia > g (x :: Vector ) = exp (x ' * x) julia > test = ones ( 4 ) julia > grad = x -> gradient (g, x); # gives the gradient julia > hess = x -> hessian (g, x); # hessian julia > higher_grad = x,y -> gradient (g, x, y) # # gives the yth order gradient julia > higher_grad (test, 3 ) 4 x4x4 Array{Float64, 3 } : [ 1091.9630006628847 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 ; 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 ; 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 ; 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 ] [ 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 ; 655.1778003977308 1091.9630006628847 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 ; 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 ; 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 ] [ 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 ; 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 ; 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 1091.9630006628847 655.1778003977308 ; 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 ] [ 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 ; 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 ; 436.7852002651539 436.7852002651539 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 ; 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 655.1778003977308 1091.9630006628847 ]
